Memories can be triggered by a number of sources

Time spent together, places visited and treasured things.

This past weekend, opened, surveyed and kept items stored away for 7 years.

There were some things that gained value over the years.
Fashions have abandoned and swallowed up most of my clothes.

Old technologies and even older memories.

Here are things I value.

Old photos
Old music in old format, with all its deficiencies.
Old handwritten records.
Old memories and love.

A bound scrapbook containing items from 4 children's growing up years.

What I wish I had more of

A hand written expression of love and appreciation

Things that cannot be created by technology, AI or otherwise.

Treasured memories

Although story about lost love.
One can insert, lost dreams.
Or lost faith.
